title: Vietnam: The Ten Thousand Day War. - Volume 5.
creator_credit: Information Television Productions, Cinequity Funding, Ian Macleod, Ron Kelly, Paul Lang and Don North
brief_description: Soldiering On - is a study of the morale and battlefield conditions of the American soldier in Vietnam. It also covers the controversy surrounding the American prisoners-of-war. “The Village War” - examines the constant struggle for control of the 16,000 villages in South Vietnam, and the beginning of the ‘Vietnamisation’ process.
